metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7955 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.4.1 through 1.6.2 did not uniformly enforce ACLs across all API endpoints, resulting in potential unintended information disclosure. Fixed in 1.6.3.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7955` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
